rules_text:
Titan’s Stairs enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{3}{RW}: Titan’s Stairs becomes a 2/2 red and white Archon creature with flying until end of turn. It’s still a land. This ability costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to red and white. Activate only once each turn.
notes:
Planename: Theros
Theros: Age of Trax Reprint
